face.transformationDescription:
[npc.Her] face starts to squish together in a tight muzzle, [npc.her] cheeks puffing up & growing a pair of internal sacs resembling a permanent blush. #IF(npc.getBodyMaterial()==BODY_MATERIAL_FLESH) A layer of [npc.faceSkin+] quickly grows to cover [npc.her] new face, #ELSE Just like the rest of [npc.her] body, [npc.her] new face is [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.faceSkin+], #ENDIF and as the transformation finally comes to an end, [npc.sheIs] left panting and sighing as [npc.she] [npc.verb(try)] to catch [npc.her] breath.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] an anthropomorphic Raichu/Pikachu face, [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.faceFullDescription].
face.bodyDescription: [npc.SheHasFull] [npc.a_feminineDescriptor(true)], anthropomorphic Raichu/Pikachu face [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.faceFullDescription(true)] and complete with rosy cheeks.
face.bodyDescriptionFeral: [npc.SheHasFull] the [npc.feminineDescriptor(true)] face of a feral [npc.legRace], which is [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.faceFullDescription(true)] and complete with rosy cheeks.
